title: Oh yummy goodness!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421062202im_/http:/typophile.com/files/heavyface-g_5220.gif)
  
I think I'm in love. :-)  
Though this "g" (and especially its ear) seems to have lost a little bit of oomph in [Adobe's digitization](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421062202/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/goudy-heavyface/) compared to whatever version is pictured (though quite small) in "Letters of Credit" (which I've finally received!), p. 132? Hmm.
author: nina
